stripped_text: When the Runner accesses this agenda while it is not installed, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0-2[credit]. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, the Runner cannot steal this agenda during this access.

title: The Future Perfect
